# GitHub Pull Request Template

Thank you for contributing to BitRoute!

---

## Description
_Describe your changes in detail._

## Related Issue
_Reference any related issues (e.g. Fixes #123)_

## Motivation & Context
_Why is this change required? What problem does it solve?_

## How Has This Been Tested?
_Describe the tests you ran and how you verified your changes._

## Screenshots (if appropriate)

## Types of Changes
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Chore

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have added tests where applicable
- [ ] All new and existing tests passed
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed

---

Please review and merge when ready.
